name: ecommerce-shopping-cart
description: Full-stack ecommerce shopping cart application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend

author: Vibe Commerce Candidate
